doc.previous: In 1988 it was renamed the Royal Aerospace Establishment before merging with other research entities to become part of the new Defence Research Agency in 1991  The first site was at Farnborough Airfield RAE Farnborough in Hampshire to which was added a second site RAE Bedford Bedfordshire in 1946
